articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Apple, Meta, and Google targeted by EU in DMA non-compliance investigations - The Verge
articles.description: The European Commission suspects that the companies aren’t in compliance with its landmark antitrust rules. The investigations will last up to 12 months.
articles.content:

articles.author: Insights Editor
articles.title: 'Shiva' and 'Shakti,' earliest building blocks of the Milky Way - Insights IAS
articles.description: Source: IE  Context: Astronomers have discovered two ancient streams of stars, named Shakti and Shiva, which are among the earliest building blocks of the Milky Way galaxy. These streams, identified using data from the European Space Agency’s Gaia telescope, …
